thing-type.label: ADC-S2000-T-RA Temperature Sensor
thing-type.description: Temperature Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtProvides temperature reading from another location so Smart Thermostat can take smarter actions to maximize comfort and energy saving.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the Pairing button on the Temperature Sensor to add it to the Z-Wave network.You will see the light on the Temperature Sensor turn solid white when it has been successfully added.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the Pairing button on the Temperature Sensor to delete it from the Z-Wave network. The light on the Temperature Sensor will start flashing to indicate it has been successfully deleted.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtEvery 4 hours.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_2
parameter.label: 1: Wake Up Period
parameter.description: Seconds to stay awake following button press

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: Temperature Reporting Threshold
parameter.description: Tenths of a degree Fahrenheit. A value of 10 would be 1.0F.

options.option: Send reports when the temperature changes.

parameter.name: config_5_2
parameter.label: 5: Battery Reporting Interval
parameter.description: Battery Reporting Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtNumber of wake up intervals between autonomous battery reports. The wake up interval is set in the Wake Up Command Class.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_2
parameter.label: 7: Temperature Reporting Interval
parameter.description: Temperature Reporting Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe number of wake up intervals between autonomous temperature reports. </p&gt <p&gtIf this value is zero, autonomous temperature reporting based on wake up interval is disabled.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_2
parameter.label: 8: Temperature Calibration Offset
parameter.description: Temperature Calibration Offset<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTenths of a degree Fahrenheit. A value of 10 would be 1.0F.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_2
parameter.label: 9: Mandatory Temperature Reporting Interval
parameter.description: Mandatory Temperature Reporting Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe number of seconds between temperature reports.</p&gt</p&gt
